oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Alford, G., 1880 June 11
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of G. Alford, dated May 11th, 1880. Illustrates the first page of the document. Alford’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on June 11th, 1880. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Alford family
